item.description:
We will continue with Emerson according to our NearFuturePlan (See More->Files->NearFuturePlan on our web page).

                      


The texts for this meeting are: 



Nature                                      


The American Scholar                         
Address to the Harvard Divinity School Class  
The Transcendentalist
item.how_to_find_us: Please send an e-mail to the organizer if this is your first time that you participate in our skype call.
item.name: Skype - Ralph Waldo Emerson
